about_the_game:
You wake up in a strange building and you're not supposed to be here. There were no doors and windows in the building, and only one elevator leading to an unknown floor. Each of floor offers a unique environment and puzzle to discover.

The demo version contains the following:

Floor 0: Lobby without exit, it seems that you should find an exit to escape from here.
Floor 1: Unsettling valley, a peaceful looking valley has some strange houses that don't look like they will attack you.
Floor 2: Spaces twist pool, you're trapped in a spaces twist pool. Observe the environment carefully to escape from loop.
Floor 3: Late night street, the disturbing sounds and the feeling of being watched at all times will keep you on your toes.

Floor 1: Unsettling valley, a peaceful looking valley has some strange houses that don't look like they will attack you.
Floor 2: Spaces twist pool, you're trapped in a spaces twist pool. Observe the environment carefully to escape from loop.
Floor 3: Late night street, the disturbing sounds and the feeling of being watched at all times will keep you on your toes.
name: The Exit of Nightmare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Exit of Nightmare is a psychological horror game with collection and puzzle elements. You're trapped in nightmare world and your goal is to find your way back to reality.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
